cast.overview: For Lieutenant Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick 'Goose' Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy, as well as personal demons, will threaten Pete's dreams of becoming an ace pilot.
cast.title: Top Gun

details.biography: Ron Clark is a Canadian comedy screenwriter and playwright. He started writing sketches while at McGill University and then moved to New York City, where he wrote monologues for dozens of stand-up comics.
details.name: Ron Clark
